array.string: set -euo pipefail; SPINE_ROOT="${SPINE_ROOT:-$HOME/code/agentic-spine}"; INF_AGENT="$SPINE_ROOT/ops/tools/infisical-agent.sh"; if [[ -x "$INF_AGENT" ]]; then if [[ -z "${ALERTING_HA_URL:-}" ]]; then ALERTING_HA_URL="$("$INF_AGENT" get-cached infrastructure prod ALERTING_HA_URL 2>/dev/null || true)"; export ALERTING_HA_URL; fi; if [[ -z "${ALERTING_HA_TOKEN:-}" ]]; then ALERTING_HA_TOKEN="$("$INF_AGENT" get-cached infrastructure prod ALERTING_HA_TOKEN 2>/dev/null || true)"; export ALERTING_HA_TOKEN; fi; fi; exec "$SPINE_ROOT/ops/runtime/alerting-probe-cycle.sh"
